name: Aik's Cheese Adventures
description:
Your task is to conduct a charismatic mouse Aik through 28 levels in search of all the pieces of cheese scattered here and there in the locations. Use the prop to control the air balloon on which Aik travels. Beware of thorns! Otherwise, the ball will burst and Ike will fall! You can not pick up all the cheese, but just fly to the hole avoiding obstacles, but then Aik will not get the stars, which is not so interesting, right?)

Features:

- 28 interesting levels of varying complexity
- juicy animated graphics
- pleasant musical accompaniment
